original_text: Then the two men came down from the hills and they crossed the Jordan River. They went back to Joshua. They told him everything that had happened.
korean_text: 그 두 사람이 돌이켜 산에서 내려와 강을 건너 눈의 아들 여호수아에게 나아가서 그들이 겪은 모든 일을 고하고

sentences.original_text: Then the two men came down from the hills
and they crossed the Jordan River
They told him everything that had happened
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 일어난 모든 일을 그에게 말했습니다
